answers: 5 - there are 5 dynamic kernel calls occuring in the program.
4 - BFS kernel executes as long as previous frontier is non zero.
1 - because we have only one deep dynamic call that adds neighborlist to the frontier.
(256*4+1024*5) - because CPU kernel launches 256 threads per block and has 4 launches while there are 5 dynamic calls launches of each 1024 threads.
5 - no changes as the dynamic kernel call for 5's neighbor would process one additional node which has been previously visited
